title: 'I average 100+ ping!' - the grand east coast lie revealed
body:
Explain to me how you can Possibly have 120+ ping, when I average 80 from this distance?
plz stop lying silver eastcoasters, you are silver now and you will be silver after the server change.
Before east coast ping became the hype you all blamed elo hell/champ balance for being trash,
stop scapegoating and get good
